channel.title: Button?
channel.description:
I want to add a button to the bottom of my client see you can click it and go to my forums.
Here's a Example of what I'm talking about at the bottom on this client. [URL=http://img513.imageshack.us/my.php?image=example.png][IMG]http://img513.imageshack.us/img513/3905/example.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Button?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

JButton mybtn = new JButton("Do Something");
mybtn.addActionListener(
    new ActionListener() {
        public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
            Forum();  // code to execute when button is pressed
        }
    }
);
Public Void Forum() {
Runtime.getRuntime().exec("C:\\Program Files\\Internet Explorer\\iexplore.exe \"http://www.Myforums.com"");
}

Read full topic
